articles.title: Congratulations to President of Lebanon
articles.content:
Congratulations to President of Lebanon
Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Wednesday sent a congratulatory message to Michel Aoun on his election as president of the Republic of Lebanon.
					 The message wished the president success in his responsible work for the country's stability and development, expressing the belief that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: Greetings to Spanish PM
articles.content:
Greetings to Spanish PM
Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, on October 31 sent a congratulatory message to Mariano Rajoy Brey upon his election as prime minister of the Kingdom of Spain.
					 The message wished him successes in his responsible work for prosperity of the country.

articles.title: FM Spokesman Slams Anti-DPRK Remarks of U.S. Deputy Secretary of State
articles.content:
FM Spokesman Slams Anti-DPRK Remarks of U.S. Deputy Secretary of State
Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK Wednesday gave the following answer to the question raised by KCNA with regard to the reckless remarks made by Blinken, U.S. deputy secretary of State, pulling up the DPRK over its measures for bolstering nuclear deterrence for self-defence:
					 On Oct. 28 during his junket to south Korea he spouted a string of invective hurting the dignified DPRK government over its legitimate nuclear and missile launch tests.
					
					 His provocative remarks are nothing but the last shrill cries made by the Obama group, frightened by the victorious advance of the DPRK's line of simultaneously developing the two fronts. 
					
					 What he uttered is no more than lamentation of the Obama group now facing the fate of a sinking boat. It sounds like a disgusting excuse for evading the responsibility for pushing the DPRK to nuclear weaponization and driving the situation on the Korean peninsula into an uncontrollable phase.
					
					 It is a tragic comedy for the Obama group to talk about "denuclearization", still failing to come to its senses. 
					
					 No matter how malignantly the Obama group may slander the DPRK, it will make a more dynamic and steady advance along the road already chosen by itself. 
					
					 The Obama group had better stop interfering in other's affairs and mind its own business at the end of its office.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants in African Regional Seminar of Juche Idea
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants in African Regional Seminar of Juche Idea
Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un received a letter from the participants in the African regional seminar of the Juche idea on "Independence and Development of Africa" on Oct. 28.
					 The participants said in the letter tha they realized once again that the countries which were colonies in the past can not achieve the genuine development and hew out their destiny without achieving the substantial independence of the country and the nation.
					
					 The letter said that the genuine independence can be achieved only by the independent and creative activities of the popular masses that are armed with the firm and independent policies and the self-development-first spirit that reject any interference by outsiders.
					
					 It noted that in order to achieve independence, progress and prosperity of Africa it is necessary to deeply study and apply the Juche idea, the idea of independence.
					
					 It said that it is very important for the African people to follow the example of the DPRK which opted for the road of socio-political development to suit its specific reality and in line with the desire of its people.
					
					 It stressed that the participants would fulfill their responsibility and duty in achieving the independent development of Africa by further deepening the study and dissemination of the Juche idea among various circles including the new generation of Africa.

articles.title: 10th Meeting of Council of African Regional Committee for Study of Juche Idea Held
articles.content:
10th Meeting of Council of African Regional Committee for Study of Juche Idea Held
Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- The 10th meeting of the Council of the African Regional Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea took place in Mfumalanga Province, South Africa on Oct. 28.
					 The meeting reviewed the work of the council since its 9th meeting.
					
					 It discussed the future work such as the plan of studying and disseminating the Juche idea next year, in which fall the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kwangju Student Incident in Korea
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kwangju Student Incident in Korea
Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- It has been 87 years since the Kwangju Student Incident took place in Korea to be recorded in the history of Korean people's struggle for the nation's dignity.
					 The incident was triggered on October 30, 1929 when Japanese students molested and insulted Korean girl students on a Kwangju-Raju train in Korea. Enraged at such rude action, Korean students gave a severe punishment to those arrogant Japanese students.
					
					 But the Japanese police committed outrages on Korean students and detained them. Under the patronage of the Japanese police, hundreds of Japanese teachers and students attacked Korean students at Kwangju Railway Station again, with different lethal weapons.
					
					 Such violent action gave vent to the pent-up wrath of all Korean students in Kwangju. They stayed away from classes all at once on Nov. 3 and staged an anti-Japanese demonstration, chanting such slogans as "Down with Japanese imperialism!" and "Abrogate the colonial slave education system!" They bravely fought against the Japanese imperialist army and police hell-bent on the suppression.
					
					 The embarrassed Japanese imperialists imposed a martial law on Kwangju area, repressing the demonstrators at random.
					
					 But the struggle rapidly spilled over into all parts of Korea from December. 
					
					 According to rough data announced by the Japanese imperialists, more than 60,000 students from 194 schools across Korea and other people of different strata took part in the anti-Japanese action from November 1929 to April of the next year.
					
					 The Japanese imperialists threw a police cordon throughout Korea and mobilized military troops of two regiments as well as policemen to put down the struggle.
					
					 The Korean people will surely get an apology and compensation from Japan for its past crimes committed during the colonial rule over their country.

articles.title: Samdung Revolutionary Site Draws Endless Stream of Visitors
articles.content:
Samdung Revolutionary Site Draws Endless Stream of Visitors
Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- More than two million people have visited the Samdung Revolutionary Site for over four decades since it was built.
					 The Samdung Revolutionary Site is the historic place where President Kim Il Sung was elected as representative of the people in the first democratic election after the liberation of the country and Samdung is associated with the undying exploits of the President and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The visitors paid floral tribute to the mosaic depicting the President, who visited the then Samdung-myon, Kangdong County, South Phyongan Province on October 16, Juche 35 (1946), waving back to the enthusiastic cheers of the people there.
					
					 They looked round the microphone used by the President when making a speech at the welcoming mass rally, cotton cloth associated with a touching story, cushion and other revolutionary relics there. 
					
					 Through the visit service personnel, working people, youth and students keenly realized that Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il are the eternal leaders of the people as they built and glorified the socialist state centered on the popular masses on this land.

articles.title: Ryugyong General Ophthalmic Hospital Starts Service
articles.content:
Ryugyong General Ophthalmic Hospital Starts Service
Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- The Ryugyong General Ophthalmic Hospital in the DPRK started its service on November 1.
					 The hospital, located in Munsu area of Pyongyang, has a four-storied outpatient ward arranged with rooms for treating various eye diseases and an inpatient ward built as green architecture.
					
					 According to Ri Myong Chol, a medical worker of the hospital, there are also a modernly-equipped operating theatre and an eye-glass shop serving all kinds of spectacles, including contact lens, swimming goggles and magnifier.
					
					 Every visitor to the hospital drops in at the shop.
					
					 Im Dong Sun, an old citizen residing in Ryukgyo-dong No. 2, Phyongchon District of Pyongyang, said after getting an eyesight test at the hospital that he wanted to express his heartfelt thanks to supreme leader Kim Jong Un for having provided such superb hospital.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Feats Kim Jong Il Performed in History of Building Juche-based Media
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Feats Kim Jong Il Performed in History of Building Juche-based Media
Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- Under the guidance of leader Kim Jong Il the Party's media could take on a more splendid appearance as the leader's media and creditably perform its mission and duty in carrying out the Party's cause in the grim years, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article.
					 Kim Jong Il's feats lie in that he clearly indicated the way to be followed by the Party's media, made sure that the media powerfully encouraged all service personnel and people and built a powerful huge contingent of Juche media, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 He put forward the programme of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism and attached primary importance to the Party's media in the struggle to carry it out.
					
					 The ideas and theories on media enunciated by him ranging from the mission and duty of the Party's media to the principles and ways of building them are the guidelines which the Party's media should hold fast to.
					
					 He energetically led the media to make all service personnel and people seethe with the zeal to make a revolution and wage struggle and patriotism true to the Party's grand plan for building a powerful socialist nation and act as pioneers in vigorously arousing them to implement the Party's policies.
					
					 It was Kim Jong Il who took warm care of the journalists and other media persons so that they might become genuine revolutionaries of Juche type who know the Party and the leader only from the period of laying down the Party's foundation for carrying forward the cause of Juche and it was again Kim Jong Il who worked heart and soul to train them as revolutionary and militant ranks faithful to the Party's cause.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Flays Ban Ki-moon's Invective against DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Flays Ban Ki-moon's Invective against DPRK
Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- Ban Ki-moon recently cried out for rapidly adopting a UN "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK over its measures for bolstering up its nuclear force.
					 Spouting a litany of groundless sophism about "serious encroachment on human rights" and "watch" on diplomats and staff members of UN bodies, Ban let out invective that the issue of "human rights in the north" should be regarded as the target of international discussion.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a commentary terms it a revelation of his cynical ploy to curry favor with the U.S. and traitor Park Geun Hye through his frantic moves to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK and thus realize his sinister political ambition.
					
					 By origin, Ban is a hand-raised despicable lackey of the U.S., the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 During his tenure of office the hostile forces' moves for stifling the DPRK have been further intensified at the UN than ever before and the situation on the Korean peninsula pushed to the brink of war. This would be unthinkable apart from his foolish pro-U.S. attitude.
					
					 Ban has kept himself busy in the international arena, steeped in worship of the U.S. and sycophancy towards it and confrontation with compatriots, far from doing even a single good thing for the nation before stepping down as the UN chief. This is a bitter shame on the nation.
					
					 He is seriously mistaken if he calculates he can easily seek "presidency," backed by the U.S. and the chief of Chongwadae.
					
					 Ban had better know that if he remains a puppet of the U.S. and Park Geun Hye as now, he will not be able to return to south Korea as an ordinary man, to say nothing of seeking "presidency".

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Japan's Sinister Intention to Update Military Hardware
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Japan's Sinister Intention to Update Military Hardware
Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- The Defense Ministry of Japan is mulling spending 300 billion yen to update interceptor missiles.
					 Japan is justifying the above-said action under the pretext of the "threat" from the DPRK.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a commentary dismisses this as nonsensical and sheer sophism. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 As for the DPRK's nukes and rockets which Japan cites as "threats," they are aimed to beat back the aggressors and provocateurs who dare do harm to the DPRK. Therefore, they are self-defensive deterrent from A to Z. 
					
					 Whoever is friendly towards the DPRK may neither get nervous about them nor have any misgiving about them.
					
					 The ulterior aim sought by Japan in groundlessly trumpeting about "threat" from the DPRK is to realize its old dream of the "Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere," backed by the U.S.
					
					 No matter what far-fetched assertions Japan may make about the DPRK, it can never cover up its criminal intention to contain big powers in Asia backed by the U.S. and, furthermore, launch reinvasion of it.
					
					 If Japan persistently follows its policies, pursuant to the U.S. line, it will suffer great trouble after becoming the target of retaliatory attack by other countries.
					
					 If the Japanese ruling forces have an iota of reasonable thinking, they should stop their dangerous military gambling.
					
					 This is the only way for Japan to get out of the abyss of ruin.

articles.title: DPRK Will Go Straight along Road Chosen by Itself: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK Will Go Straight along Road Chosen by Itself: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- U.S. and other Western media are vying with each other to report that the present U.S. administration is racking its brain over how to cope with the steady bolstering of the DPRK's nuclear attack capability whereas its line of simultaneously developing the two fronts is registering unimaginable achievements.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in a commentary this is an objective comment on the undeniable reality.
					
					 The DPRK is demonstrating its might as a nuclear power in the East as it is dynamically advancing under the unfurled banner of the Juche-based line of simultaneously developing the two fronts while foiling the vicious obstructions of the hostile forces.
					
					 The reality goes to prove that the U.S. ruling forces' persistent pressure and blockade against the DPRK only make the latter grow stronger and give fuller play to its dignity and might before the world.
					
					 The enemies are now making shrill cries, seized with fear and uneasiness in the face of the nuclear treasured sword of Juche Korea, the great vitality of socialism and its comprehensive national power.
					
					 It is the psychology of the U.S. political and academic circles that a series of expectations for the administration's policy of "strategic patience" turned into half in doubt and suspicion and skepticism and it is floundering in the mire of frustration and setback.
					
					 The imperialists' desperate efforts to block the DPRK from advancing along the above-said line go to prove that its way is the most just and correct one.
					
					 No matter what rhetoric the U.S. may let out to bar the DPRK's dynamic advance, it will remain undeterred and go straight along the road chosen by itself.

articles.title: Minju Joson Blasts Japanese Reactionaries' Persistent Visits to Yasukuni Shrine
articles.content:
Minju Joson Blasts Japanese Reactionaries' Persistent Visits to Yasukuni Shrine
Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- Japanese reactionaries have persistently visited Yasukuni Shrine.
					 About 80 ultra-right politicians affiliated to "the Association of Dietmen for Visiting Yasukuni Shrine" recently swarmed to the shrine to pay homage to the departed war criminals. Even the Japanese minister of General Affairs and the assistants to the prime minister paid similar visits to it.
					
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Wednesday says: 
					
					 The persistent visits paid by Japanese reactionaries to the shrine despite protest and condemnation by Asian countries were prompted by their foolish daydream to repeat their crime-woven history.
					
					 They are seeking an important purpose through their frequent visits to the shrine.
					
					 They regard such visit as an occasion of paying tribute to the soul of the departed war criminals and pledging to realize the militarist ambition for overseas aggression at any cost by carrying forward their spirit.
					
					 A particular mention should be made of the fact that they are persistently refusing to make apology and reparation for the most hideous unethical crimes, turning down the demand of the international community for the settlement of Japan's past crimes.
					
					 It is needless to say that all this is connected with their moves for the above-said overseas aggression.
					
					 Their frequent visits to the shrine to call back the departed soul of the militarists remind one of psychopaths desperately scouring a dumping ground to look for something.
					
					 They had better stop such foolish actions and take the road of peace.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Group's Moves to Conclude Military Agreement with Japan Prompt Angry Response from People
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Group's Moves to Conclude Military Agreement with Japan Prompt Angry Response from People
Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- It was reported that south Korean opposition parties and civic and public organizations and even some members of the ruling party are strongly rejecting the decision made by the Park Geun Hye group on resuming the discussion for striking an agreement on protection of military information with Japan.
					 The Minju Party affirmed it would check the said acts of Park at a meeting on Oct. 28, saying the Lee Myung Bak regime couldn't help but stop halfway the push for an agreement four years ago in the face of a defiant response from the people. It queried what made the regime attempt again to join hands with Japan militarily.
					
					 The Kukmin Party expressed strong opposition to an agreement at an emergency meeting on the same day, saying the striking of the agreement would only encourage the dream of Japan's militarism. 
					
					 Some civic and social organizations also held a joint press conference on the same day and demanded an immediate stop to the push for the negotiations with Japan.

articles.title: Hypocritical Reshuffle of Chongwadae Confidants Rebuffed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Hypocritical Reshuffle of Chongwadae Confidants Rebuffed in S. Korea
Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- Traitor Park Geun Hye of south Korea staged the farce of replacing confidants of the secretaries room of Chongwadae on Oct. 30 in a bid to tide over the worst crisis caused by the monopolization of administration stunning the world people, according to press reports.
					 Choe Jae Gyong was appointed as chief secretary for civil administration. He has earned ill fame for being a member of shock brigade in the moves to help traitors Lee Myung Bak and Park Geun Hye weather political crisis.
					
					 A parliamentary spokesperson for the Minju Party insisted that this is aimed to tide over the "Park Geun Hye-Choe Sun Sil scandal".
					
					 A former lawmaker from the party also branded it as a scheme to conceal the sensation caused by the monopolization of administration.
					
					 The representative of the party aid it is an extension of the scheme to make an inspection into the case in favor of Chongwadae.
					
					 A chief spokesperson of the Kukmin Party noted that it is aimed to cover up the monopolization of administration.

articles.title: Anti-"Government" Actions of Youth and Students Unabated in S. Korea
articles.content:
Anti-"Government" Actions of Youth and Students Unabated in S. Korea
Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- An editorial on the anti-"government" actions of youth and students unabated in south Korea was posted on the south Korean on-line paper Voice of People on Nov. 2.
					 The editorial said students and professors of almost all universities turned out in the campaign for publishing the declaration on the situation in recent one week.
					
					 The people are turning their back on Park Geun Hye and the present regime is coming close its collapse, an eruption of the pent-up resentment at the "president" who mocked at the people for four years of her office, while giving power to Choe Sun Sil, it said.
					
					 It urged Park to step down as demanded by the people.

articles.title: S. Korean People Turn Out in Anti-Park Geun Hye Actions
articles.content:
S. Korean People Turn Out in Anti-Park Geun Hye Actions
Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- South Korean people from all walks of life are strongly demanding traitor Park Geun Hye step down, according to press reports.
					 On Oct. 29, the federation of the postgraduate general student councils of 10 universities made public a declaration on the situation in demand of the creation of a suprapartisan body replacing Park Geun Hye.
					
					 Workers, media persons, religionists and other people call for punishment of the chief executive.
					
					 12 media organs called a press conference to declare that they would struggle together with civic and public circles and other people till Park Geun Hye steps down.
					
					 The south Korean Council of Christian Churches said Park Geun Hye should resign and face legal investigation and punishment in a proper manner. 
					
					 The south Korean Kyunghyang Daily News on Oct. 31 carried an editorial titled "President Park Geun Hye should take hands off state affairs".
					
					 On Oct. 29 there appeared a scaffold near Kwanghwamun in Seoul which is symbolic of punishment of Park Geun Hye, drawing public attention.
					
					 The support rate for Park Geun Hye dropped as low as 10.4 percent, according to the results of opinion poll issued on Tuesday.
					
					 The Newsis of south Korea said that it showed the people do not recognize Park Geun Hye as "president," in fact.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Restructuring to Massively Dismiss Subcontracted Workers Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Restructuring to Massively Dismiss Subcontracted Workers Slammed
Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- Subcontracted workers of south Korea who had been dismissed by the puppet authorities' restructuring in the field of shipbuilding staged a protest rally in Koje City, South Kyongsang Province on Oct. 29, according to the south Korean internet paper Chamsesang.
					 They urged the authorities to give jobs to workers according to wages and shutdown of business and abolish the illegal system of exploitation.
					
					The civic and public measure committee for checking massive dismissal of the subcontracted shipbuilding workers grouping 61 civic organizations accused the regime of announcing that 60,000 jobs would be cut down in two years to come.
					
					 Then, the participants staged a demonstration toward Taewoo Shipyard.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye's Ignorance and Incompetence Disclosed Again
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye's Ignorance and Incompetence Disclosed Again
Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- A former lawmaker of south Korea disclosed Park Geun Hye's ignorance and incompetence, according to a report.
					 He was a spokesman and executive chairman of the "Grand National Party" and confidant of Park Geun Hye. During the 2012 "presidential" election he released a book saying that "Park Geun Hye is not qualified to be president."
					
					 After the "presidential" election he was branded as a traitor and forced to quit the political camp for disclosing Park's ignorance and incompetence.
					
					 At the press conference on the "Park Geun Hye-Choe Sun Sil scandal" on Oct. 30 he upheld his earlier assertion, saying that had Park modestly accepted advice she would have not been thrown into the present difficult position.

articles.title: Park Gun Hye Has Been Forsaken by People: S. Korean Radio
articles.content:
Park Gun Hye Has Been Forsaken by People: S. Korean Radio
Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- Support rate of Park Gune Hye is falling rapidly, according to south Korean CBS.
					 The opinion poll on Oct. 28 reportedly hit the all-time low of 14 percent since her inauguration.
					
					 Commenting on this, the radio said it precisely meant Park's impeachment by the people in their minds, urging her to reflect on her wrongdoings and make a sincere apology before the people and face a special investigation.

articles.title: Seoul Mayor Ridicules Park Geun Hye as Vegetable-like
articles.content:
Seoul Mayor Ridicules Park Geun Hye as Vegetable-like
Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- Seoul Mayor Pak Won Sun in a press conference on Oct. 30 ridiculed Park Geun Hye as a vegetable-like woman, according to south Korean News 1.
					 Noting south Koreans were stunned by Choe Shun Sil's monopolization of the administration, the mayor termed the present south Korean "government" vegetable one.
					
					 He added that citizens should change the south Korean society with their organized efforts.

articles.title: Korean On-line Newspaper in U.S. Demands Park Geun Hye's Immediate Resignation
articles.content:
Korean On-line Newspaper in U.S. Demands Park Geun Hye's Immediate Resignation
Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- An article demanding Park Geun Hye's immediate resignation was posted on Minjok Thongsin, an internet newspaper of Koreans in the U.S., on Oct. 30.
					 Recalling protesting south Koreans are getting increasingly vocal demanding the immediate resignation of Park, not mere impeachment, the article said:
					
					 South Koreans of various circles are planning to stage a mammoth candlelight rally involving a million on November 12 to oust Park.
					
					 In case Park seeks a loophole under this situation, she will face an unimaginably severe punishment.

articles.title: Koreans in U.S. Urge Park Geun Hye to Step Down
articles.content:
Koreans in U.S. Urge Park Geun Hye to Step Down
Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- Koreans in the U.S. are waging actions in demand of Park Geun Hye's resignation, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 A Koreans organization in Seattle, the U.S. in a statement on Oct. 29 termed the south Korean regime a senseless and abnormal one.
					
					 Koreans organizations in Washington in a statement on Oct. 27 demanded Park Geun Hye step down at once and be punished by law.

articles.title: Seminar on Juche Idea Held in South Africa
articles.content:
Seminar on Juche Idea Held in South Africa
Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- The African seminar of the Juche idea on "Independence and Development of Africa" took place in Mfumalanga Province, South Africa on Oct. 28.
					 A report and speeches followed a congratulatory speech there.
					
					 A reporter and speakers highly lauded President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who turned the DPRK into a political, ideological and military power and made immortal contributions to accomplishing the cause of global independence as the outstanding teachers of the progressive humankind and eternal sun.
					
					 They referred to the fact that Marshal Kim Jong Un has written the epic of prioritizing, respecting and loving the people, applying the peerlessly great men's idea of believing in the people as in Heaven, and stressed that it is the brilliant fruition of the wise leadership of HE Kim Jong Un and a clear demonstration of the validity, vitality and invincibility of the Juche idea that the Korean people have made world-startling miracles in all spheres.
					
					 They expressed their determinations to make positive contributions to the independent development of the region by wisely disseminating Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism among the African people, saying that Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism is the great guiding idea of the present times which is brightly illuminating the road of accomplishing the cause of global independence including the building of independent Africa.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe carta de participantes en seminario regional africano
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe carta de participantes en seminario regional africano
Pyongyang, 2 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Al Mariscal Kim Jong Un le remitieron el 28 de octubre una carta los participantes en el seminario de la idea Juche de la region africana con el tema "Independencia y Desarrollo de Africa".
					En la misiva los participantes escribieron que a traves del simposio, volvieron a comprender una vez mas que sin lograr la independencia sustancial del pais y la nacion, los paises ex colonias no podran lograr el desarrollo verdadero ni forjar correctamente su destino, y prosiguieron:
					
					La verdadera independencia es posible solo con la firme politica independiente de rechazar a las intervenciones foraneas de toda indole y con las actividades independientes y creativas de las masas populares armadas por el espiritu de autofortalecimiento.
					
					Para lograr la independencia, el progreso y la prosperidad de Africa, es necesario estudiar profundamente la idea Juche, pensamiento de independencia, y materializarla.
					
					Se presenta como labor importantisima para los africanos aprender el ejemplo de la RPDC que escogio el camino de desarrollo sociopolitico conveniente a la realidad del pais y al deseo de su pueblo.
					
					Cumpliremos con toda nuestra responsabilidad y deber en lograr el desarrollo independiente de Africa al profundizar el estudio y la divulgacion de la idea Juche entre las masas populares de diferentes estratos, particularmente, entre los jovenes de nueva generacion de Africa.

articles.title: Portavoz de MINREX de RPDC rechaza difamacion anti-RPDC de Blinken
articles.content:
Portavoz de MINREX de RPDC rechaza difamacion anti-RPDC de Blinken
Pyongyang, 2 de noviembre (ACNC) -- En relacion con que el subsecretario de Estado de Estados Unidos acuso las medidas tomadas por la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea para fortalecer el disuasivo nuclear de caracter autodefensivo, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio el dia 2 a la ACNC la siguiente respuesta:
					Durante su viaje al Sur de Corea, el 28 del mes expirado, Blinken, subsecretario de Estado de EE.UU., se atrevio a ofender el digno poder de la RPDC, censurando su justa prueba nuclear y de lanzamiento de misiles.
					
					La provocacion verbal de Blinken no pasa de ser ultimo suspiro de la banda de Obama, desmayada por la materializacion de la linea de desarrollo paralelo de la construccion economica y la de las fuerzas nucleares de la RPDC.
					
					Tambien es un lamento pobre y una excusa para liberarse de la responsabilidad por haber empujado a la RPDC a poseer las armas nucleares y llevado la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana al estado incontrolable.
					
					Es muy ridiculo que la camarilla de Obama siga insistiendo en la irrealizable desnuclearizacion.
					
					Aunque la horda de Obama intensifique la difamacion anti-RPDC, esta avanzara con mas vigor por el camino recto optado por si misma.
					
					A los compinches de Obama, que terminaran pronto su mandato, les seria mejor arreglar las cosas domesticas en lugar de intervenir en los asuntos ajenos.

articles.title: Ex parlamentario surcoreano revela ignorancia de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
Ex parlamentario surcoreano revela ignorancia de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 2 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Segun transcendidos surcoreanos, el ex parlamentario surcoreano volvio a revelar la ignorancia e incapacidad de Park Geun-hye.
					El, quien en otro tiempo fue vocero y supremo miembro del "Gran Partido Nacional" y ayudante de Park Geun-hye, escribio el libro con el contenido de que "Park Geun-hye no tiene la calidad de presidenta" en el periodo de las elecciones "presidenciales" de 2012.
					
					En su volumen, insistio en que "Park Geun-hye no puede ni debe ser la presidenta. Le faltan los conocimientos politicos y humanisticos y ella no comprende profundamente los articulos redactados en los periodicos. Es decir ella es novata."
					
					Despues de las elecciones presidenciales, el se retiro del circulo politico siendo calificado del "traidor", porque revelo la ignorancia e incapacidad de Park.
					
					En una entrevista con prensa ofrecida el 30 de octubre en relacion con el "escandalo de Park Geun-hye y Choe Sun Sil", el dijo que si Park aceptara modestamente su consejo, no se pondria en el destino de ahora, abogando por su insistencia anterior.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun refuta calumnias anti-RPDC de Ban Ki-moon
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun refuta calumnias anti-RPDC de Ban Ki-moon
Pyongyang, 2 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Hace poco, Ban Ki-moon insistio en aprobar lo mas pronto posible la "resolucion de sancion" de la ONU cuestionando las medidas tomadas por la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea para fortalecer sus fuerzas armadas nucleares. 
					Y solto los disparates absurdos tales como "grave violacion de derechos humanos" y "vigilancia" sobre los diplomaticos y los funcionarios publicos de la ONU y maldijo que el problema de "derechos humanos del Norte" debe someterse al debate internacional. 
					
					En un comentario individual de este miercoles, Rodong Sinmun lo califica de expresion del malsano intento de atraer la simpatia de EE.UU. y la traidora surcoreana Park Geun-hye con su conducta conflictiva anti-RPDC y asi lograr la sucia ambicion politica, y continua:
					
					Por su temperamento pronorteamericano y fidelidad a EE.UU., durante su mandato se ha intensificado mas que nunca la campana conflictiva anti-RPDC de las fuerzas hostiles en la arena de la ONU y llego la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana en la coyuntura de estallido de la guerra. 
					
					En estos momentos en que esta a punto de vencer su mandato, este vendepatria recurre al servilismo pronorteamericano y al enfrentamiento fratricida en la palestra internacional, lejos de hacer los trabajos utiles para su propia nacion. 
					
					Este tipejo piensa en que podria conseguir facilmente la "presidencia" del Sur de Corea bajo la ayuda de EE.UU. y la duena de Chongwadae, pero es una gran equivocacion. 
					
					Ban debe tener presente que su actitud como marioneta de EE.UU. y la traidora Park Geun-hye le hara imposible de regresar al Sur de Corea como candidato al "presidente" ni tampoco como un hombre comun.

articles.title: Minju Joson denuncia a reaccionarios japoneses que siguen visitando al santuario Yasukuni
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia a reaccionarios japoneses que siguen visitando al santuario Yasukuni
Pyongyang, 2 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Los reaccionarios japoneses realizan persistentemente la visita al santuario Yasukuni.
					Hace poco, cerca de 80 politicos ultraderechistas pertenecientes al "Encuentro de parlamentarios para visitar juntos el santuario Yasukuni" visitaron este santuario y tambien lo hicieron el ministro de Asuntos Generales y el asistente de premier. 
					
					Pese a la unanime propuesta y denuncia de los paises asiaticos, los reaccionarios japoneses no cesan de hacer esa visita, lo cual reside en la ilusion vana de resucitar la historia criminal. 
					
					Revela asi el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual de este miercoles y continua:
					
					El importante objetivo de esos reaccionarios que frecuentan la visita al santuario Yasukini es aprovecharla como una oportunidad para consolar el espiritu de los criminales caidos de la guerra y tomar la "decision" para realizar a toda costa la ambicion de agresion militarista a ultramar heredando el espiritu de agresion de ellos. 
					
					En particular, los reaccionarios japoneses evitan a toda costa la disculpa e indemnizacion por sus crimenes de lesa humanidad desafiando frontalmente a la demanda de la sociedad internacional. 
					
					Indudablemente, todo esto esta relacionado con las maniobras militaristas de agresion a ultramar. 
					
					El proceder de los reaccionarios japoneses que suelen a visitar el santuario Yasukuni a fin de resucitar el fantasma militarista hace imaginar a los psicopatas que remueven con afan el basurero. 
					
					Los reaccionarios deben dejar de portarse imprudentemente y optar el camino por la paz verdadera.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia el intento de Japon para renovar sus armamentos militares
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia el intento de Japon para renovar sus armamentos militares
Pyongyang, 2 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El Ministerio de Defensa de Japon plantea invertir 300 mil millones de yenes en la renovacion de los equipos de misiles interceptores bajo el pretexto de la "amenaza" de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Esto deviene una sofisteria que no se conviene a la razon, ni puede convencer a nadie.
					
					Asi denuncia el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 2, y prosigue:
					
					Las armas nucleares y los cohetes de la RPDC, cuestionados por Japon como "amenaza", constituyen de punto a cabo el disuasivo para la autodefensa que tiene como blanco a los agresores y provocadores contra aquella. Por tanto, los paises que tratan de manera amistosa a la RPDC no tienen necesidad de temerlo.
					
					El verdadero intento de Japon reside en realizar su viejo sueno de la "esfera de coprosperidad de la gran Asia Oriental" bajo el amparo de EE.UU.
					
					Japon no podra ocultar jamas su objeto criminal de mantener a raya a las potencias del contorno y precipitarse en el camino de la nueva agresion contra Asia en contubernio con EE.UU.
					
					Si Japon no abandona invariablemente ese camino obedeciendo a su amo gringo, no podra evitar una gran catastrofe siendo blanco de venganza de otros paises.
					
					Si las fuerzas gobernantes tienen siquiera un minimo juicio racional, no debe recurrirse en la peligrosa aventura militar.
					
					Esto es el unico remedio para salvar a Japon de la trampa de destruccion.
